result.name: sardine-and-anchovy-survey-off-southwest-england-2010-11-fisheries-science-partnership
result.notes:
To measure key population parameters of sardine and anchovy in the western 
Channel, to help determine the relationship of these stocks to others in the 
area. Acoustic, plankton and other biological data will be collected from 
sardine and anchovy to establish their range of distribution, spawning 
locations, age groups and relationship with other commercial pelagic species 
in the survey area.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network

organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.
